<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=5212) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 262 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Trigger**
While you have your shield raised, you would take physical damage (bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing) from an attack.

</column>

---

You snap your shield in place to ward off a blow. Your shield prevents you from taking an amount of damage up to the shield’s Hardness. You and the shield each take any remaining damage, possibly breaking or destroying the shield.

<title level="2">Shield Block leads to...</title>
[Bastion Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6262), [Channeling Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=4686), [Quick Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=4816), [Shield Warden](/Feats.aspx?ID=4807)
name: Shield Block
